reporting-org.narrative: Organisation des Nations unies pour l'éducation, la science et la culture (UNESCO)
United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization (UNESCO)

title.narrative: Capacity-building training and awareness-raising activities on the fight against illicit trafficking of cultural property in the West Bank and Gaza Strip, Palestine

description.narrative: The overarching aim of this activity is to create national services dedicated to the fight against illicit traffic in cultural property, control of importations and exportation's, and to provide training and fieldwork in order to support the Ministry of Tourism and Antiquities and other relevant beneficiaries (lawyers, police and custom officers, officials from concerned governmental institutions, heritage professionals, local communities) in preventing and fighting against the illicit trafficking of cultural property in the oPt. In addition, the activity will include support to the finalization of the draft cultural heritage law as a legislative tool necessary to protect cultural properties.
